root.name: God of War Saga
root.description: God of War Saga includes the following games:God of WarGod of War IIGod of War IIIGod of War: Origins Collection (which includes God of War: Chains of Olympus and God of War: Ghost of Sparta as a Downloadable Voucher)Exclusive Bonus ContentVoucher For 1 Trial Month of PlayStation PlusRemastered for HD, DUALSHOCK Control, Full PlayStation Network Trophy Support and 3D (3D supported only in God of War: Origins Collection)The Collection will be released in North America on August 28, 2012 for $39.99.

similar_games.game: The Ico & Shadow of the Colossus Collection
